value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code. value.title: Row Level Security in Power BI desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #27
value.excerpt: In this video we will see how to add Row Level security to your Power BI data.  Row Level security is used to restrict data access for given users. value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
